data_table.description: Subject - Sample - Mapping (Sample Use term Updated).

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPID
variable.description: Sample ID used in the Source Repository

variable.name: HUMAN_1_M
variable.description: Indicator if subject was included in the set genotyped using the Illumina 1M BeadChip

variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.value: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays
